info.name: FitFlow API
info.description: Complete API collection for FitFlow - A comprehensive fitness tracking API with authentication, workout planning, exercise management, and social features (Updated with workouts, enrollments, and workout plan items endpoints)

request.description: Check if the API is running
Create a new muscle group

query.description: Filter by category (upper, lower, core, cardio)

body.raw:
{
  "email": "trainer@example.com",
  "password": "{{test_password}}",
  "password_confirm": "{{test_password}}",
  "first_name": "Personal",
  "last_name": "Trainer",
  "trainer_profile": {
    "bio": "Experienced fitness trainer specializing in strength and conditioning with over 10 years of experience.",
    "specialty_ids": ["{{specialty_strength_training_id}}", "{{specialty_hiit_id}}", "{{specialty_weight_loss_id}}"],
    "hourly_rate": 75.00,
    "location": "New York, NY",
    "visibility": "public"
  }
}
